::Spears::

She looked down at herself, still covered in black soot and grime.
"I don't know. The last time I tried to take care of a computer, it 
attacked me." She smiled and chuckled.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Striker::
> 
> Striker shruggs. "I think we should reinforce the walls first so 
that they 
> won't collapse on us," he says, looking at the charred outer shell 
of the 
> Ark, "Or maybe salvage whatever technology is left intacts."
